title: (x) new Sky Magazine font - Infinity {Isaac}
content:
![ergfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109100104im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3257.jpg)

 [‹ Please help me with this Titleist logo.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109100104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3996 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Sakde - Funhouse {Chesh} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109100104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4126 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Now THAT's what I call a sexy contemporary sans. Looks gorgeous. Nice solution for lc "g", like some stuff [Nick Cooke](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109100104/http:/www.fontworks1.type.co.uk/cgi-bin/fontworks2/x011956002?G4VoHq23;;4411) or [Rian Hughes](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109100104/http:/www.devicefonts.co.uk/) might come up with. I wanna know too.
Which Sky Magazine is this? You could always try e-mailing them or the design bureau if there's any contact information in the magazine. Yaneverknow...
it may be infinity by thirstype. let me chrck.
yup. that g is pretty distinctive. i thought maybe someone copied it, but that's infinity. i dig it.

[www.thirstype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109100104/http:/www.thirstype.com/)   
   
check out the flash blurb about infinity, especially the head to head to head with meta and din. way to go chester! also cool is faux cra. save your nickels and dimes.
I think I might whup out my Visa card for this beauty. Chester rewlz. So does Isaac.
i was waiting for someone to notice. ha.
